title: Does anyone who actually plays Galio excited and happy with his rework?
body: OR is everyone who never played the champ just excited about a new toy to try out? Im really sad to see my champion get deleted so a brand new one could exist.

replies.body: This one can actually fly so i'll play him
I feel like most peoples negative opinions right now are based on his looks being very different. Just wait for the kit to come out so we can actually know what he does
So long as they changed his W  it can't be all bad
From what I've seen so far, I'm glad that in charge of the urgot rework is a different team. This galio looks weird and I'm worried about his abilities.

He will, I've heard, still have his aoe taunt somewhere.


That being said, I'm excited about him because he looks so cool. Taliyah was interesting, but she didn't look cool. Ivern was endlessly interesting, but pacifist playstyle didn't appeal to me. Galio, on the other hand, looks big and intimidating.
